translated: Mao Zedong (or Mao Tse-tung in French), commonly known as Mao is a Chinese political figure - revolutionary, theorist, and statesman guérilléro1 - which has profoundly marked the history of his country for almost half of twentieth century century.
original: Mao Zedong (ou Mao-Tsé-toung en français), couramment appelé Mao, est un personnage politique chinois — révolutionnaire, théoricien, guérilléro1 et homme d'État — qui a profondément marqué l'histoire de son pays pendant près de la moitié du XXe siècle siècle.
